Class XMLIO

java.lang.Object
  model.XMLIO
Direct Known Subclasses:
BulletinBoardIO
public class XMLIO
extends java.lang.Object

Helpful base class for loading and saving the bbs.xml document that holds the applications data.

Author:
wouterken
